price: Ìsẹ̀mí wà fún yín nínú (òfin) ìgbẹ̀san, ẹ̀yin onílàákáyè, kí ẹ lè bẹ̀rù (Allāhu).
arabic: وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡقِصَاصِ حَيَوٰةٞ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
